loreEntries.title: The Kingdom of Taldor
loreEntries.content: Taldor is one of the oldest human kingdoms still standing in the Inner Sea region. Once the mightiest empire in the region, Taldor has since fallen into a state of decadence and decline. The nation is known for its aristocracy, its fine wines and cuisine, and its talented duelists.

loreEntries.title: The Great Wyrm Karasoth
loreEntries.content: Karasoth is an ancient red dragon who has terrorized the northern mountains for centuries. It is said that his hoard contains treasures from fallen kingdoms and civilizations long forgotten. Many brave adventurers have sought to defeat him, but few have returned to tell the tale.

loreEntries.title: The Order of the Shining Star
loreEntries.content: A knightly order dedicated to Sarenrae, the Order of the Shining Star focuses on healing the sick and injured as well as hunting undead and fiends. Founded two centuries ago after the Plague of Shadows, the order maintains chapter houses in most major cities across the Inner Sea region.

loreEntries.title: The Whispering Tyrant
loreEntries.content: Once a powerful lich known as Tar-Baphon, the Whispering Tyrant ruled the land of Ustalav for centuries before being defeated and imprisoned beneath Gallowspire by the Shining Crusade. Recent events have led to concerns that his prison may be weakening.

loreEntries.title: The Starstone Cathedral
loreEntries.content: Located in the center of Absalom, the Starstone Cathedral houses the titular Starstone, a fragment of a fallen star. Those who manage to reach the Starstone and pass its test are elevated to godhood. Only three mortals have ever succeeded: Aroden, Cayden Cailean, and Iomedae.
